servinfo.title: Steering Angle Sensor Removal and Installation (ESP® model)

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Steering Wheel and Column Construction:Diesel Engine Model

s1.ptxt: Remove steering wheel and contact coil cable assembly. Refer to Steering Wheel Removal and Installation:Diesel Engine Model and Contact Coil Cable Assembly Removal and Installation:Diesel Engine Model .
Remove steering angle sensor (2) from contact coil cable assembly (3) while opening fitting parts (1) of contact coil cable assembly.
Install steering angle sensor (2) by fitting engagement parts (1) of contact coil cable assembly to claws of steering angle sensor as shown in figure.

Install contact coil cable assembly and steering wheel. Refer to Contact Coil Cable Assembly Removal and Installation:Diesel Engine Model and Steering Wheel Removal and Installation:Diesel Engine Model .
